alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rooks County through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Palco, or 10 miles northeast of Ogallah, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Palco around 735 PM CDT. Zurich around 740 PM CDT. Plainville around 745 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas.
